name: Star Arthur Densetsu I: Wakusei Mephius
summary: Legend of Star Arthur I: Planet Mephius, published by T&E Soft for the FM-7 in 1983, was one of the earliest adventure games to use a command menu system, the first with a point & click interface, and one of the earliest episodic games. The 1985 MSX version was the first adventure game with FMV backgrounds & cutscenes.
